thread.title: EPA crew at Standard Mine above Crested Butte causes wastewater spill
thread.title_full: EPA crew at Standard Mine above Crested Butte causes wastewater spill

title: EPA crew at Standard Mine above Crested Butte causes wastewater spill
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
An EPA crew working at the Standard Mine above Crested Butte has triggered a spill of wastewater into a creek....
